get.description: Verify if the server is working correctly

200.description: It returns either the string 'healthy' or the string 'not healthy'

get.description: Print back the headers of the request

200.description: The list of headers (name and value), one per line

schema.example:
Accept: */*
X-Request-ID: dbe2938410b8e80c0444ddf552492546
X-Forwarded-Host: dsl-modelix.siginet.lu
X-Forwarded-Proto: https
X-Original-URI: /headers
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.26.8
Host: dsl-modelix.siginet.lu
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
X-Forwarded-Port: 443
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ijk2QUM4ODMxOUQ4Rjk4RkNENTU4RkZCNEQ2NEVBNEIwMjQ2NjUxQzUiLCJ0eXAiOiJhdCtqd3QiLCJ4NXQiOiJscXlJTVoyUG1QelZXUC0wMWs2a3NDUm1VY1UifQ..gI6laH2X7ztV5bAR2C-DbOpS98bZ-h7rczQ7ZK_CFUWedHYMVowz-cuTQwevTmfD3Ypd4ztfMoEQQExrdpm4Mmz-HnR-uCj0adFILvpJ8_RmSsr3BEcTuWUPZFmDZv2i_SP7exIpMbQSrl19eoZH5kObx1NKra3YXtbD_mmqqHTGmHByk3OCE4lm1Wy8wTDBq9pk7quiJKuvPbtwFl3AyGv6ctVWDqWvnycNDsoOMDafFVcxH9DjsCDiFn9vlZV-6CVkfxUs1Hsvu6ro_JoeYHnjns2jOOwNR58SrHtEgSUiL0bqJ5ZCSlqijkIMnPimlm_XIRH3h18zQJrYXJJbPg

200.description: The value associated with the key

403.description: If the user is not authorized or the key is protected (keys prefixed with '$$$' are considered protected)

404.description: If the key is not found

get.description: Generate an authentication token for the user. It first check for the header X-Forwarded-Email. In case the value is not present or empty and the address is trusted the email value default to localhost

200.description: The token is created and store, with an expiration of 7 days

403.description: If no email value is present and the address is not trusted the token cannot be generated

get.description: Retrieve the email associated to a given token

content.description: It returns the email associated with the token, if a token has been provided. Otherwise it returns the value '<no email>'

403.description: If there is not proper authorization. Proper authorization is presented either when the request comes from a trusted address or when the Authorization header contains a proper value

post.description: Increase a counter associated with the key

200.description: The value associated with the key

403.description: If there is not proper authorization. Proper authorization is presented either when the request comes from a trusted address or when the Authorization header contains a proper value. Also requests for protected keys cause this answer
